data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Madurai. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Madurai, Tamil Nadu, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Madurai. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, help the 33,421 believers in Madurai to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,004,879 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Madurai
